API¶

class etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.crawler.base.Crawler(name: str, sources: list[etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.crawler.link.BaseLink], connector: BaseConnector | None = None, handler: BaseHandler | None = None, retry_policy: RetryPolicy | None = None)¶

Bases: CrawlerInterface

A Crawler.

Provides configuration of resoucres which will be crawled.

Basic Usage:

>>> images = Crawler(name='images', sources=[StaticLink('https://images.com/image_url')])
>>> images
<Crawler 'images'>
all() → Resource¶

Create a Resource object with how = ‘all’ for initialized crawler.

connector¶

A BaseConnector object responsible for connection for resources

handler¶

A BaseHandler object responsible for handling requests

name¶

A name of Crawler

new() → Resource¶

Create a Resource object with how = ‘new’ for initialized crawler.

parse(parser: BaseParser, pattern: str = '') → Link¶

Every crawled resources matched the pattern will be parsed with parser.

Parameters:

  • parser – A BaseParser object

  • pattern – A pattern to match

Returns:

A Link object

retry_policy¶

A RetryPolicy object responsible for retrying requests

sources¶

A set of Link

class etl_pipeline.pipeline_lib.crawler.base.Resource(crawler: Crawler, how: str)¶

A Resource object.

crawler: Crawler¶

A Crawler object

how: str¶

Which resources executor will crawl. Possible values: ‘all’, ‘new’.
